pkgmetadata.longdescription: An R package to Identify, Annotate and Visualize Alternative Splicing and Isoform Switches with Functional Consequences (from RNA-seq data) // IsoformSwitchAnalyzeR enables identification and analysis of alternative splicing and isoform switches with predicted functional consequences (e.g. gain/loss of protein domains etc.) from quantification by Kallisto, Salmon, Cufflinks/Cuffdiff, RSEM etc.
